DOC.brief_summary: Hip fractures are usually classified according to their X-ray as subcapital, pertrochanteric. We examine hip fractures with ultrasound in order to characterize the fractures with several parameters.
DOC.brief_title: Hip Fracture Characterization With Ultrasound Exam
DOC.criteria: patients over 50 years with x rays showing a hip fracture previous fracture or surgical intervention in the hip fracture over 3 days old pregnancy flexion contracture of hip
